required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate Safety and Effectiveness of Transcatheter Aortic Valve System in Patients With Severe Aortic Stenosis
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multi-center, Single-arm Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of Transcatheter Aortic Valve System in Patients With Severe Aortic Stenosis With or Without Moderate or Lower Degree Regurgitation

brief_summary.textblock: To Evaluate the Safety and Effectiveness of Transcatheter Aortic Valve System ( Chengdu Silara Medtech Inc. ,Chengdu, China)in Patients with Severe Aortic Stenosis with or without Moderate or Lower Degree Regurgitation

detailed_description.textblock: Transcatheter Aortic Valve System (Chengdu Silara Medtech Inc. ,Chengdu, China) will be used for this study.

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of subjects who died from all causes in this population.

secondary_outcome.description: Device Success is defined as a composite of : Absence of procedural mortality AND Successful vascular access, delivery and deployment of the device, and successful retrieval of the delivery system AND Correct positioning of prosthetic heart valve into the proper anatomical location AND Intended performance of the prosthetic heart valve (mean aortic valve gradient<20 mmHg or peak velocity<3 m/s, and no severe prosthetic valve regurgitation or PVL)
Procedure Success is defined as no death, stroke, myocardial infarction and renal failure occurred within 72 hours after the operation on the basis of the final device success.
Delivery System Performance wil be evaluated subjectively by the researchers participating in the operation, which is generally classified as excellent, good ,average and poor.
Retrieval System Performance wil be evaluated subjectively by the researchers participating in the operation, which is generally classified as excellent, good ,average and poor.
Exchange Systerm Evaluation wil be evaluated subjectively by the researchers participating in the operation, which is generally classified as excellent, good ,average and poor.

secondary_outcome.measure: Valvular function evaluation, including valve stenosis, AR, valve function(e.g. EOA, gradient) and PVL
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post-procedure, 7days or discharge, 30 days, 6 months ,12months and 2-5 years
secondary_outcome.description: The evaluation criteria refer to the 2012 edition of the Association for Valvular Academic Research (VARC-2) consensus document

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7 days or discharge, 30 days, 6 months ,12 months and 2-5 years
Immediate post- procedure ,7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months and 2-5 years.
Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months ,12months and 2-5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of MACCE(including mortality, stroke, MI, re-procedure, Conduction disturbances and cardiac arrhythmias)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months,12months and 2-5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Bleeding (life-threatening or disabling and major)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months,12months and 2-5 years.
7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 months and 2-5 years.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of AKI (stage 2 and 3,or renal replacement therapy (RRT: Hemodialysis, abdomen Cavity dialysis, hemofiltration))
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 months and 2-5 years.
7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 months and 2-5 years.
Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 months.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of Conduction disturbances and cardiac arrhythmias
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 month and 2-5years
Immediate post- procedure, 7 days /discharge, 30 days, 6 months, 12 month and 2-5years
secondary_outcome.description: including transfer to surgery , Accidental heart-lung machine, coronary obstruction, ventricular septal rupture, Mitral valve damage or dysfunction，cardiac tamponade，endocarditis ，valvular thrombus，Valve migration(shifting, detachment,embolism,error deployment）,valve in valve

arm_group.description: Patients will be treated with Transcatheter Aortic Valve Systerm
